task.title: Integrate with Trend Micro Vision One

context.p:
Users can query for malware detection logs via Trend Micro Vision One Search app.
Be sure to complete the deployment of Trend Micro Vision One Service Gateway first, and then obtain the required information for Service Gateway settings in steps 2 and 3. Please contact your support provider for more information.

step.cmd: On console, go to Administration Service Integration .
Specify the IP address and API key of Trend Micro Vision One Service Gateway in Service Gateway Address and Service Gateway API Key.

note.p: The IP address and API key should be obtained from the Trend Micro Vision One Service Gateway Virtual Appliance.

step.cmd: Specify the Trend Micro Vision One enrollment token in Product Connector Enrollment Token.

note.p: The enrollment token is required to register to Trend Micro Vision One. The enrollment token will expire within 24 hours if not used after generated from the Vision One Product Connector app.

step.cmd: Select the frequency for sending detection logs to Trend Micro Vision One in the Log Sending Interval drop-down menu.

note.p: To stop sending detection logs to Trend Micro Vision One, select the Disabled option.

step.cmd: Click Test Connection to determine whether is connected successfully to Trend Micro Vision One.
Click Save to complete the settings.
